titleStmt.title: An answer to a booke entitvled An hvmble remonstrance in which the originall of liturgy, episcopacy is discussed : and quares propounded concerning both : the parity of bishops and presbyters in Scripture demonstrated : the occasion of their imparity in antiquity discovered : the disparity of the ancient and our moderne bishops manifested : the antiquity of ruling elders in the church vindicated : the prelaticall church bownded / written by Smectymnvvs.
titleStmt.author: Smectymnuus.
Milton, John, 1608-1674.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for I. Rothwell and are to be sold by T.N. ...,

notesStmt.note: Wing attributes authorship to Stephen Marshall, who with Edmund Calamy, Thomas Young, Matthew Newcomen and William Spurstowe, wrote under the pseudonym Smectymnuus.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
